## useChatState() function

A React hook that returns a Chat state in store as specified by the map function.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useChatState<T>(stateSelector: StateSelector<T>): T;
```

T

## Remarks

This hook must be used only within [ChatHeadlessProvider()](./anguyen-chat-headless-react-test.chatheadlessprovider.md)<!-- -->. Otherwise, it will throw an error.
